<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Blessed Blood (Aasimar)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1354) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Aasimar" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=256" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 36 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Your freshly spilled blood is sanctified, and ingesting it causes effects similar to those of [holy water](/Equipment.aspx?ID=245). Whenever a [fiend](/Traits.aspx?ID=70), [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160), or creature with a weakness to good damage drinks your blood or deals piercing or slashing damage to you with jaws, fangs, or a similar attack, that creature takes 1d6 good damage. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) checks to [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=43) holy water using your own blood as one of the ingredients.
name: Blessed Blood (Aasimar)
